content.rendered:
ABOUT SPACEDESK

Welcome to spacedesk.net, the home of innovative display technology crafted by datronicsoft, a pioneer in software development. Founded in Augsburg, Germany, datronicsoft has been at the forefront of creating versatile display solutions that extend Windows desktops across multiple screens.

Our flagship product, spacedesk, has revolutionized the way users expand their digital workspace. Since our inception in 2006, we’ve expanded globally, offering tools that allow seamless integration of additional monitors via network connections, USB, or wireless means.

From home offices to large enterprises, spacedesk empowers users everywhere to enhance their productivity and multi-tasking capabilities by turning any device into a secondary display. This technology supports a wide range of devices including tablets, smartphones, and PCs, making it a versatile choice for users around the world.

Join us on our journey of innovation and user-centric design, as we continue to redefine the possibilities of digital displays and collaborative work environments.

REVIEW PLATFORMS RATINGS OF SPACEDESK

spacedesk has been reviewed on several platforms, where users can leave feedback and rate the software based on their experiences. Here’s a list of platforms where spacedesk has been reviewed along with the relevance of these reviews:

Google Play Store
4.6 (27.152 Reviews)
Apple App Store

Heise

RELEASE HISTORY

July 2025

spacedesk DRIVER v2.2.04

Dec 2024

spacedesk BUSINESS VERSION now available on iOS Viewer

Dec 2023

spacedesk BUSINESS VERSION now availabe on Android Viewer

Dec 2023

spacedesk DRIVER v2.1.1 Release version replacing all Beta Versions

Jan 2018

spacedesk VIEWER first Beta for iOS

Oct 2016

spacedesk VIEWER first Beta for Android

Apr 2014

spacedesk VIEWER first Beta for Windows 7

Apr 2014

spacedesk DRIVER Beta v0.9.1

LICENSING

Non-commercial private license:

  • On Windows Primary Machine download and use free spacedesk Driver software
  • On Secondary Mobile Devices install spacedesk App from the stores (Google Play, Apple, Microsoft)
  • Use free spacedesk Viewer App from the stores

Commercial business license:

  • On Windows Primary Machine download and use free spacedesk Driver software
  • On Secondary Mobile Devices install spacedesk App from the stores (Google Play, Apple, Microsoft)
  • IF AVAILABLE purchase Commercial Business License in the App-Stores (In-App-Purchase)
  • DO NOT USE free spacedesk Android Viewer App without purchasing a Commercial License

Transitional period:

Availability of spacedesk Commercial Business License:

  • Android: Available now
  • Apple iOS: Available now
  • Windows: 2025 Q2

spotlight

DESKTOP DUPLICATION DISPLAY MONITOR SOFTWARE /MIRROR

spacedesk software display extension monitor can cast screen content of primary Windows machine to other mobile devices, laptops and computers over WiFi, USB or network cable.

Download

DESKTOP EXTENSION DISPLAY MONITOR SOFTWARE /EXTENSION

spacedesk software turns mobile devices, laptops and desktops into an additional extension display monitor for Windows machines. Windows can smoothly be moved to and from other connected monitors.

Download

CREATIVE VIDEO
WALL DISPLAY SOFTWARE /VIDEO WALL

spacedesk software video wall can be used for digital signage to display advertisements, dashboards, menus, or even just beautiful scenery to enhance the ambience.

Download

TOUCH, STYLUS-PEN, KEYBOARD AND MOUSE SOFTWARE /INPUT

spacedesk is a software KVM switch (Keyboard Video Mouse). It enables control of a primary Windows machine by mobile devices, laptops and desktops connected over network or USB.

Download

AUDIO PLAYBACK SPEAKER DEVICE SOFTWARE /AUDIO

spacedesk software redirects audio speaker output sound from a primary Windows machine to mobile devices, laptops and desktops connected over network or USB.

Download

MOBILE DEVICE AS WEBCAM /INPUT

spacedesk software display extension monitor can cast screen content of primary Windows machine to other mobile devices, laptops and computers over WiFi, USB or network cable.

Download
